function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other pandemic related risks in indoor spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation and air quality control measures, rethinking building design strategies","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies","People":"Occupants of built environments, especially indoor spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and environmental health experts"},{"Description":"Lack of thorough multidisciplinary investigations into environmental health for future designs","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of indoor environments on disease spread","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive multidisciplinary investigations and studies on indoor environmental health","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and analysis tools for indoor air quality, collaboration platforms for multidisciplinary teams","People":"Interdisciplinary teams of architects, environmental health experts, and scientists","Owner":"Architectural firms, research institutions, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance solely on ventilation systems for addressing indoor disease spread","Impact":"Limitation in effectively controlling the spread of contagious diseases in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementing a combined approach with complementary interventions alongside ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purification technologies, advanced filtration systems, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation","People":"Architects, building operators, and environmental health experts","Owner":"Facility management teams, architectural firms"}]}
